```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(ggstatsplot)
```

```{r}
data <- read_delim(file = 'ospan_and_survey.csv',delim=",", show_col_types = FALSE)
```

```{r}
data
```

```{r}
data %>% group_by(gender) %>%
  summarise(mean = round(mean(age), digits = 2),
            sd = round(sd(age), digits = 2),
            range = paste(min(age), "-", max(age)),
            n = sum(!is.na(age)))
```

`1` = Nainen, `2` = Mies

```{r}
data <- data %>% mutate(diff = score_1 - score_2 )
data <- data %>% mutate(total_score = score_1 + score_2 )
```

```{r}
ggscatterstats(data, x = age, y = total_score)
```

```{r}
ggscatterstats(data = filter(data, age < 50), x = age, y = total_score)
```

```{r}

grouped_ggscatterstats(data = data,grouping.var = gender, x = ovs_monitoring, y = total_score)

```

```{r}
ggscatterstats(data = data, x = ovs_monitoring, y = total_score)

```

```{r}
ggplot(data) + 
  geom_density(aes(diff))
```

```{r}
grouped_gghistostats(data = data.long, grouping.var = bal, x = Score)
```
